data.actual_result: Discord un-maximizes or un-minimizes, stealing focus despite the fact you closed a completely unrelated window..
data.expected_result: Discord isn't supposed to be stealing focus or changing window size when you're working in other windows.
data.short_description: When opening Steam URL links like for Steam Controller configurations, after closing the window Discord will un-maximize
data.steps_to_repro: - Send this URL in a message in Discord: steam://controllerconfig/750920/1514956276 - Click the link - When the window pops up, close it.
